source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Blender 3D: Let's Modelling an 3D Owl Character with Blender
items.headline: Improve your modeling practice with useful tips. This course includes; 3D modeling, 3D texturing and 3D rendering tips.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to make basic models with Blender 3D.
You will learn how to Texturing with Blender 3D.
You will learn how to Rendering with Blender 3D.

items.title: Animation from Beginners using Animaker
items.headline: Learn the basics of animation and make your content more engaging and lively
objectives_summary: Grow and engage your audience with content that cuts through digital noise.
Design backgrounds, animated characters and scenes from Scratch
Using actions to make your characters life-like and engaging.

items.title: Principles of Animation in action
items.headline: Create a realistic animation with three principles
objectives_summary: They will learn how to use Principles of Animation in order to create simple animation

objectives_summary: Learn the basics of Lighting in Cinema 4D

items.title: FDM 3D Printing with Cura
items.headline: From A to Z
objectives_summary: Students will learn about how to select the proper settings for their specific 3D printer

items.title: Scifi Sword Tutorial:  Blender / Quixel / Unreal
items.headline: Learn how to model, texture, and present a Sword for video games.
objectives_summary: Learn how to model, texture and present a game ready sword for your portfolio
